net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data

Class TreeModelHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data.TreeModelHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, TreeModelListener

    public final class TreeModelHelper
extends Object
implements TreeModelListener
    Helper class for a TreeModel.

    This is intended for internal MIWT use only. Use Tree.getModel().

    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • createIdStringFromPath

        public String createIdStringFromPath(TreePath path)
        Creates a string of tab separated child IDs from a TreePath.
        Parameters:
        path - The TreePath or null if not all of the nodes in the path have IDs.
        Returns:
        A tab separated list of Strings.

      • createPathFromString

        @Nonnull
public TreePath createPathFromString(String str)
        Creates a path from a comma or dash separated list of child indicies.
        Parameters:
        str - A comma separated list of integers.
        Returns:
        TreePath.

      • createStringFromPath

        public String createStringFromPath(TreePath path)
        Creates a string of dash separated child indicies from a TreePath.
        Parameters:
        path - The TreePath.
        Returns:
        A dash separated list of integers.

      • getPathFromIdString

        public TreePath getPathFromIdString(String ids,
                           String suggestedElementIndices)
        Finds the TreePath using IDs previously retrieved from the model.
        Parameters:
        ids - A tab separated list of node ids.
        suggestedElementIndices - A dash separated list of possible child indicies, may be null if no suggestion.
        Returns:
        Integer.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no path is associated with the IDs.

      • isColumnInteractive

        public boolean isColumnInteractive(int modelIndex)
        Get if the column at the model index is interactive.
        Parameters:
        modelIndex - the model index.
        Returns:
        true if interactive.

      • isHeaderInteractive

        public boolean isHeaderInteractive(int modelIndex)

        modelIndex - the model index.
        Returns:
        true if interactive.
